nodes.text: Unidentified B2-HA series super battle droid  (Rodia)

This B2-HA series super battle droid was present on Rodia during the subsequent apprehension of Senator Padmé Amidala. He was in command of the other B1-Series battle droids. After being notified by a fellow droid, it fired a rocket at Jar Jar Binks when he fled into the swamps. However, a Kwazel Maw saved Jar Jar from the rocket and the B2 commander was later presumably destroyed by the same Kwazel Maw.
